```{r setup}
library(rTorch)
```


## Scalars

```{r}
torch$scalar_tensor(2.78654)

torch$scalar_tensor(0L)

torch$scalar_tensor(1L)

torch$scalar_tensor(TRUE)

torch$scalar_tensor(FALSE)
```

## Vectors

```{r}
v <- c(0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5)
torch$as_tensor(v)
```
